menu.name: Bruschetta
menu.description: Toasted bread topped with a mixture of chopped tomatoes, basil, garlic, and olive oil.

menu.name: Caprese Salad
menu.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil drizzled with balsamic reduction.

menu.name: Arancini
menu.description: Deep-fried risotto balls stuffed with cheese and served with marinara sauce.

menu.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
menu.description: Pasta tossed with pancetta, egg, pecorino cheese, and black pepper.

menu.name: Lasagna alla Bolognese
menu.description: Layered pasta sheets with beef ragù, béchamel sauce, and Parmesan cheese.

menu.name: Risotto ai Funghi
menu.description: Creamy rice dish cooked with assorted mushrooms and Parmesan cheese.

menu.name: Tiramisu
menu.description: Layered dessert made with coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, cocoa, and whipped cream.

menu.name: Panna Cotta
menu.description: Creamy custard-like dessert topped with berry coulis.
